name: Penan Ecco Warrior (Blow Darts)
description:
Penan Ecco Warrior is here to survive the ChatGPT4.0 era! He's armed with a handmade blowpipe with poisoned blow darts! 

WASD + mouse + hold "space" + Take A Deep Breath = BLOW to fire darts! 

“A hand-made blowpipe is still the weapon of one’s heart’s desire,”

“An experienced Penan hunter can accurately hit his target at marvellous speed with a single blow at one end of the blowpipe,”

Blow darts are made from natural poisons from the Ipoh Tree. Myths have it that an Iban could not find it after walking towards an Ipoh tree near Skrang. 

The Penans are known for ‘walking through the jungle in silence’ as they believe talking is not good to the spirits of the forest.

The Penans also believe many trees will disappear from human sight if human sounds are heard in the jungle. To them, talking is best avoided in the forests of Borneo.

Blow darts to target birds, monkeys, squirrels, wild boars and even a deer! Survive as a Penan for food gathering!

Programmer: PythonGamerzzz
2D Artist: BeeVomit

5-minutes PItch

Day 1: Briefing, iftar and checkin' out the jamming venue

Day 2: Arrived at 1345H (overslept!)

Day 3 :: Arrived early at 8:20AM
